5 tablespoons olive oil, divided,4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breasts,1 lemon, juiced,salt and freshly ground black pepper,1 ½ cups halved cherry tomatoes,1 bunch green onions, cut into ½-inch slices,½ cup chicken broth,2 tablespoons coarse-grained mustard,1 ½ sprigs fresh rosemary, chopped,½ bunch fresh thyme, chopped,2 cups shredded Gruyère cheese,,
